changes.change: Fixed a crash caused by some Splash Potions generated through slash Commands. The Player can now delete a world and save a resource pack if the path has UTF-8 characters. Fixed updating Player Inventory slots. Fixed Realms crash when placing an Item Frame. Fixed game crash when renaming a Map. Creepers explode when attacked by Snow Golems now. Fixed a crash when creating a new world. Fixed crashes caused by Fire Arrows. Fixed crash on iOS devices when game is resumed. Fixed crash when a player eats a piece of cake.
